basics.name: Anna Malinovskaia
basics.label: Quality Assurance Engineer
basics.summary: üñêÔ∏è I'm a QA Engineer (Python) and Professional Google searcher. My job is to investigate various services and features and identify errors in their work as early as possible. My priority goal is to combine my Soft and People Management skills with QA and develop with an emphasis on team management in the long term. I am interested development in Automation, Security and Penetration Testing. I like to teach others, be a Mentor and create something new, so if you have tasks or a product that I could help you with, please write me.

education.institution: Saint Petersburg State University of Finance and Economics

awards.title: Member of the election commission with the right of advisory vote

work.summary: Project: Fintech, Crypto. Stack: Playwright+TypeScript, Allure TestOps, git, gitlab ci. Mobile app: Flutter. Tools: Confluence, Jira, Figma, Firebase(NoSQL), Android Studio & Xcode, OneSignal.
work.name: Cryptology

work.summary: Search and hiring of high-level IT specialists: DevOps Cloud, QA Automation, Python for relocation. Help with relocation. Creating and conducting training sessions on Sourcing for colleagues. Creating a bot for the recruiters department in telegram (@littlehrthings_bot). Active participation and development of the Cloud (Azure, AWS, GCP) community. launching new projects for external and internal audiences (articles, YouTube videos, podcasts).
work.name: EPAM

work.summary: Mass search (various resources: job sites, social networks, internal database of candidates, etc.). Scheduling of interviews, conducting interviews, including mass interviews. Creating and posting vacancies on external job sites and social media channels. Participation in organizing and conducting evaluations for candidates, training and adapting new employees, and helping to develop a mentoring culture. Formation of the company's HR brand.
work.name: Avito

work.summary: Assistance to the HR department in the selection. Organization of workplaces and entry into the company. Creating and maintaining a database of employees. Writing articles for the corporate forum. Organization of employee training. Assistance in maintaining personnel records, maintaining a report card of employees. Maintaining the accounting documentation of the sales department. Collecting information from the advertising department for invoicing and closing documents.
work.name: Embria

work.summary: Administrative support for office employees. Partial management of the KDP. Formation and maintenance of a database on the composition of office employees, accounting support. Working with the HR department. Implementation and supervision of the corporate English language school. Assistance in development, writing articles for the corporate magazine of the company. Organization and holding of all corporate events and holidays. Organizing the merger of two offices in St. Petersburg and moving.
work.name: Social Quantum Development
